item.description:
Please note: This is a two day event Sept. 29th and 30th and while not dedicated to veganism there will be vegan cooking demos, Veg Worcester in the Outdoor Exhibitor Tent, along with Revitalive Cafe, Loving Hut and Like No Udder soft serve vegan ice cream!  

Natural Health Expo   There is a $10 entry fee, good for entire weekend http://naturalexpo.org/attend/healthy-cooking-demos/ Sturbridge Host Hotel, Sturbridge, MA Sunday Sept. 30th How Easy It Is To Be Vegan with Shayna Ashton

11am Breakfast: The Start to a Great Day
Pie for breakfast! Learn a yummy fruit sweetened blueberry pie with a whole grain and oat crust. So it’s really like having oatmeal and berries.

12pm What’s for Lunch?
Chick pea o’ the sea. This creative salad features flaked chickpeas and walnuts. Super nutritious in a sandwich or a wrap, and best of all, so easy!

1pm Vegan Ribs?
Seitan is usually time consuming and hard to make. We bake the ribs and smother them with a tangy BBQ sauce. You won’t believe how easy these are to make!

2pm Dinner Time: Shepherds Pie with Seitan
We will be using Gimme Lean Ground Round, corn and fluffy mashed potatoes. Wonderful for a hearty, fall dinner and best of all, it is quick to make with little clean up.

 

3pm Dessert: The Perfect Ending to Any Meal
Smooth, rich and creamy tofu cheesecake with a raspberry sauce.

Shayna Ashton has been a vegan her whole life and has been cooking for 25 years. She loves experimenting with new ideas and making delicious American comfort dishes. Her approach to food is that the presentation is as important as preparing flavorful, nutritious meals. She and her family owned and operated the former Country Life Vegan Restaurant in Boston. Lately she has been working with the Boston Vegetarian Society giving monthly vegan cooking classes. She shares recipes, info on great products, and timesaving tips that show how easy it is to be vegan. She also offers vegan catering, personal chef services, and special occasion vegan cakes. Look for her vegan baked goods this October at V Organic Cafe, 62 Main Street, Upton, MA. Follow her blog at shaynasvegankitchen.blogspot.com.
item.name: How Easy It Is To Be Vegan with Shayna Ashton at the Natural Living Expo
